title: Directory Page Object
description: Directory page object contains paging information for related directory when directory result is paginated.

xdm:orderBy.title: Order by property
xdm:orderBy.description: The property by which this page is ordered.

xdm:start.title: First value
xdm:start.description: The first value, in sorted order, of the orderby property on this page.

xdm:next.title: Next page start value
xdm:next.description: The start value for the next page.

xdm:property.title: Filter properties
xdm:property.description: The list of properties by which the result is filtered, if any.

xdm:type.title: Filter type value
xdm:type.description: The applied type filtering value, if any.

xdm:count.title: Number of items
xdm:count.description: The number of items on this page.
